quotes.quote: Every single moment of reality instantly turns into memories; reality can not be caught; we can only catch memories.
The truth is a snare: you cannot have it, without being caught. You cannot have the truth in such a way that you catch it, but only in such a way that it catches you.
Catch, then, O catch the transient hour; Improve each moment as it flies!
An aware individual stays awake from within to catch such signals and utilizes them to delineate their perception of the world.
Do not try to catch the happiness because happiness is not a thing you can catch, it is a thing you can create with your own mind only!
When you catch a glimpse of your potential, that's when passion is born.
and when he catches me off guard and says 'i love you' i catch him off guard and say 'i need your help.
Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
The Constitution only gives people the right to pursue happiness. You have to catch it yourself.
Life is all memory, except for the one present moment that goes by you so quickly you hardly catch it going.
There are many things in life that will catch your eye, but only a few will catch your heart...pursue those.
If you chase perfection, you often catch excellence.
To catch a husband is an art; to hold him is a job.
One does not meet oneself until one catches the reflection from an eye other than human.
